title: AI Learning Platform
descriptions: Developed a full-stack study platform that automatically generates learning materials such as flashcards, mind maps, and quizzes.
Built a complete authenticated frontend with tools for creating, managing, and reviewing study content.
Implemented gamification and competitive features, including points and friend-based challenges, to increase user engagement.

title: Minimalistic Workflow Manager
descriptions: Cross-platform desktop application for automating workflows, including opening code editors, documents, websites, and applications based on custom events.
Supports auto-startup, multi-monitor app placement, and seamless integration with system-level APIs for enhanced productivity.
Built with a minimalistic interface focused on speed and efficiency; currently under active development.

title: Freshly - Online Farmers' Market
descriptions: Developed a full-stack online farmers' market platform with a .NET Core MVC website for users, sellers, and organizations, enabling seamless product management and orders.
Created a Flutter mobile application allowing users to browse products, place orders, track deliveries, and communicate with local farmers in real-time.
Integrated secure authentication, role-based access, email services, and intuitive interfaces across web and mobile, ensuring a smooth experience for both customers and sellers.

title: ClockR - Modern chess clock
descriptions: Developed and published a feature-rich mobile application using Flutter, designed for chess enthusiasts needing a reliable digital chess clock.
Implemented fully customizable time controls, allowing users to set classical, rapid, blitz, or custom game modes tailored to their preferences.
Integrated alarms and notifications for move timing, game start/end, and turn changes, enhancing usability and improving game experience.

title: Predicting sketches with KNN
descriptions: Built a machine learning-powered application that classifies user-drawn sketches in real-time using a custom KNN algorithm.
Preprocessed sketches with PCA and StandardScaler to improve model accuracy and reduce computational load for fast predictions.
Designed an interactive React-based interface allowing users to draw, clear, and receive instant predictions, making the app intuitive and engaging.
